product.title: Glowing Skin Face Scrub BKIND - Curcuma in Multi
product.body_html: Glowing skin face scrub made with turmeric, lemon and yellow clay for a radiant skin. This all natural face scrub has been created for the skin to be softly exfoliated and hugely moisturized at the same time.
